abstract:
July 14, 2009
Gary M. Stern, General Counsel
National Archives and Records Administration
NGC-Room 3110
8601 Adelphi Road
College Park, MD 20740
Dear Mr. Stern:
This is a request under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. § 552 as 
further speciﬁed in the National Archives and Records Administration (NARA) FOIA 
Regulations, 36 C.F.R. § 1250. The purpose of this request is to obtain copies of all 
technical standards that have been Incorporated By Reference into the Code of Federal
